title: What is the past of TXT members? - Quora

response.answer_text: They just debuted so we don’t know much about them yet but here is a little bit that we do know. Yeonjun - used to live in San Jose, California for a while during elementary school which is why he is fluent in english. He was a Cube trainee for a brief time before becoming a Big Hit trainee. He has been with Big Hit for 3/4 years now as a trainee. In all the monthly evaluations he would come in first at dance, vocal and rap. HueningKai - was born in Hawaii, moved around a lot growing up, his dad is of German descent but grew up in Brazil and then Ameirca, so he knows English. His mom is Korean. They lived in China for a while because his dad was a singer there which is why he knows Mandarin. He moved to Korea to pursue the idol life, joining Big Hit. Taehyun - used to be a child actor and was in a lot of commercials. He is also fluent in english studying from a young age and was used in commercials to promote english learning in korea. Not much is known yet about Beomgyu or Soobin’s past before Big Hit, I’m sure more info will be updated as time goes on. I can tell you that Beomgyu learned how to play guitar by himself from a young age as well as write songs.
